speaker: COMINIUS
text_entry: SCENE II. Entrance of the Volscian camp before Rome.

speaker: COMINIUS
text_entry: Two Sentinels on guard.

speaker: COMINIUS
text_entry: Enter to them, MENENIUS

speaker: First Senator
text_entry: Stay: whence are you?

speaker: Second Senator
text_entry: Stand, and go back.

speaker: MENENIUS
text_entry: You guard like men; 'tis well: but, by your leave,

speaker: MENENIUS
text_entry: I am an officer of state, and come

speaker: MENENIUS
text_entry: To speak with Coriolanus.

speaker: First Senator
text_entry: From whence?

speaker: MENENIUS
text_entry: From Rome.

speaker: First Senator
text_entry: You may not pass, you must return: our general

speaker: First Senator
text_entry: Will no more hear from thence.

speaker: Second Senator
text_entry: You'll see your Rome embraced with fire before

speaker: Second Senator
text_entry: You'll speak with Coriolanus.

speaker: MENENIUS
text_entry: Good my friends,

speaker: MENENIUS
text_entry: If you have heard your general talk of Rome,

speaker: MENENIUS
text_entry: And of his friends there, it is lots to blanks,

speaker: MENENIUS
text_entry: My name hath touch'd your ears it is Menenius.

speaker: First Senator
text_entry: Be it so; go back: the virtue of your name

speaker: First Senator
text_entry: Is not here passable.

speaker: MENENIUS
text_entry: I tell thee, fellow,

speaker: MENENIUS
text_entry: The general is my lover: I have been

speaker: MENENIUS
text_entry: The book of his good acts, whence men have read

speaker: MENENIUS
text_entry: His name unparallel'd, haply amplified;

speaker: MENENIUS
text_entry: For I have ever verified my friends,

speaker: MENENIUS
text_entry: Of whom he's chief, with all the size that verity

speaker: MENENIUS
text_entry: Would without lapsing suffer: nay, sometimes,

speaker: MENENIUS
text_entry: Like to a bowl upon a subtle ground,

speaker: MENENIUS
text_entry: I have tumbled past the throw; and in his praise

speaker: MENENIUS
text_entry: Have almost stamp'd the leasing: therefore, fellow,

speaker: MENENIUS
text_entry: I must have leave to pass.

speaker: First Senator
text_entry: Faith, sir, if you had told as many lies in his

speaker: First Senator
text_entry: behalf as you have uttered words in your own, you

speaker: First Senator
text_entry: should not pass here; no, though it were as virtuous

speaker: First Senator
text_entry: to lie as to live chastely. Therefore, go back.

speaker: MENENIUS
text_entry: Prithee, fellow, remember my name is Menenius,

speaker: MENENIUS
text_entry: always factionary on the party of your general.

speaker: Second Senator
text_entry: Howsoever you have been his liar, as you say you

speaker: Second Senator
text_entry: have, I am one that, telling true under him, must

speaker: Second Senator
text_entry: say, you cannot pass. Therefore, go back.

speaker: MENENIUS
text_entry: Has he dined, canst thou tell? for I would not

speaker: MENENIUS
text_entry: speak with him till after dinner.

speaker: First Senator
text_entry: You are a Roman, are you?

speaker: MENENIUS
text_entry: I am, as thy general is.

speaker: First Senator
text_entry: Then you should hate Rome, as he does. Can you,

speaker: First Senator
text_entry: when you have pushed out your gates the very

speaker: First Senator
text_entry: defender of them, and, in a violent popular

speaker: First Senator
text_entry: ignorance, given your enemy your shield, think to

speaker: First Senator
text_entry: front his revenges with the easy groans of old

speaker: First Senator
text_entry: women, the virginal palms of your daughters, or with

speaker: First Senator
text_entry: the palsied intercession of such a decayed dotant as

speaker: First Senator
text_entry: you seem to be? Can you think to blow out the

speaker: First Senator
text_entry: intended fire your city is ready to flame in, with

speaker: First Senator
text_entry: such weak breath as this? No, you are deceived;

speaker: First Senator
text_entry: therefore, back to Rome, and prepare for your

speaker: First Senator
text_entry: execution: you are condemned, our general has sworn

speaker: First Senator
text_entry: you out of reprieve and pardon.

speaker: MENENIUS
text_entry: Sirrah, if thy captain knew I were here, he would

speaker: MENENIUS
text_entry: use me with estimation.

speaker: Second Senator
text_entry: Come, my captain knows you not.

speaker: MENENIUS
text_entry: I mean, thy general.

speaker: First Senator
text_entry: My general cares not for you. Back, I say, go; lest

speaker: First Senator
text_entry: I let forth your half-pint of blood; back,--that's

speaker: First Senator
text_entry: the utmost of your having: back.

speaker: MENENIUS
text_entry: Nay, but, fellow, fellow,--

speaker: MENENIUS
text_entry: Enter CORIOLANUS and AUFIDIUS

speaker: CORIOLANUS
text_entry: What's the matter?

speaker: MENENIUS
text_entry: Now, you companion, I'll say an errand for you:

speaker: MENENIUS
text_entry: You shall know now that I am in estimation; you shall

speaker: MENENIUS
text_entry: perceive that a Jack guardant cannot office me from

speaker: MENENIUS
text_entry: my son Coriolanus: guess, but by my entertainment

speaker: MENENIUS
text_entry: with him, if thou standest not i' the state of

speaker: MENENIUS
text_entry: hanging, or of some death more long in

speaker: MENENIUS
text_entry: spectatorship, and crueller in suffering; behold now

speaker: MENENIUS
text_entry: presently, and swoon for what's to come upon thee.

speaker: MENENIUS
text_entry: To CORIOLANUS

speaker: MENENIUS
text_entry: The glorious gods sit in hourly synod about thy

speaker: MENENIUS
text_entry: particular prosperity, and love thee no worse than

speaker: MENENIUS
text_entry: thy old father Menenius does! O my son, my son!

speaker: MENENIUS
text_entry: thou art preparing fire for us; look thee, here's

speaker: MENENIUS
text_entry: water to quench it. I was hardly moved to come to

speaker: MENENIUS
text_entry: thee; but being assured none but myself could move

speaker: MENENIUS
text_entry: thee, I have been blown out of your gates with

speaker: MENENIUS
text_entry: sighs; and conjure thee to pardon Rome, and thy

speaker: MENENIUS
text_entry: petitionary countrymen. The good gods assuage thy

speaker: MENENIUS
text_entry: wrath, and turn the dregs of it upon this varlet

speaker: MENENIUS
text_entry: here,--this, who, like a block, hath denied my

speaker: MENENIUS
text_entry: access to thee.

speaker: CORIOLANUS
text_entry: Away!

speaker: MENENIUS
text_entry: How! away!

speaker: CORIOLANUS
text_entry: Wife, mother, child, I know not. My affairs

speaker: CORIOLANUS
text_entry: Are servanted to others: though I owe

speaker: CORIOLANUS
text_entry: My revenge properly, my remission lies

speaker: CORIOLANUS
text_entry: In Volscian breasts. That we have been familiar,

speaker: CORIOLANUS
text_entry: Ingrate forgetfulness shall poison, rather

speaker: CORIOLANUS
text_entry: Than pity note how much. Therefore, be gone.

speaker: CORIOLANUS
text_entry: Mine ears against your suits are stronger than

speaker: CORIOLANUS
text_entry: Your gates against my force. Yet, for I loved thee,

speaker: CORIOLANUS
text_entry: Take this along; I writ it for thy sake

speaker: CORIOLANUS
text_entry: Gives a letter

speaker: CORIOLANUS
text_entry: And would have rent it. Another word, Menenius,

speaker: CORIOLANUS
text_entry: I will not hear thee speak. This man, Aufidius,

speaker: CORIOLANUS
text_entry: Was my beloved in Rome: yet thou behold'st!

speaker: AUFIDIUS
text_entry: You keep a constant temper.

speaker: AUFIDIUS
text_entry: Exeunt CORIOLANUS and AUFIDIUS

speaker: First Senator
text_entry: Now, sir, is your name Menenius?

speaker: Second Senator
text_entry: 'Tis a spell, you see, of much  power: you know the

speaker: Second Senator
text_entry: way home again.

speaker: First Senator
text_entry: Do you hear how we are shent for keeping your

speaker: First Senator
text_entry: greatness back?

speaker: Second Senator
text_entry: What cause, do you think, I have to swoon?

speaker: MENENIUS
text_entry: I neither care for the world nor your general: for

speaker: MENENIUS
text_entry: such things as you, I can scarce think there's any,

speaker: MENENIUS
text_entry: ye're so slight. He that hath a will to die by

speaker: MENENIUS
text_entry: himself fears it not from another: let your general

speaker: MENENIUS
text_entry: do his worst. For you, be that you are, long; and

speaker: MENENIUS
text_entry: your misery increase with your age! I say to you,

speaker: MENENIUS
text_entry: as I was said to, Away!

speaker: MENENIUS
text_entry: Exit

speaker: First Senator
text_entry: A noble fellow, I warrant him.

speaker: Second Senator
text_entry: The worthy fellow is our general: he's the rock, the

speaker: Second Senator
text_entry: oak not to be wind-shaken.

speaker: Second Senator
text_entry: Exeunt
